00153 BOOLEAN EnterMercsFiles()
00154 {
00155   VOBJECT_DESC    VObjectDesc;
00156 
00157       InitMercBackGround();
00158 
00159       // load the stats box graphic and add it
00160       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00161       GetMLGFilename( VObjectDesc.ImageFile, MLG_STATSBOX );
00162       CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiStatsBox));
00163 
00164       // load the Portrait box graphic and add it
00165       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00166       FilenameForBPP("LAPTOP\\PortraitBox.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
00167       CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiPortraitBox));
00168 
00169       // load the bio box graphic and add it
00170       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00171       FilenameForBPP("LAPTOP\\BioBox.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
00172       CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiBioBox));
00173 
00174 
00175       // Prev Box button
00176       guiButtonImage  = LoadButtonImage("LAPTOP\\BigButtons.sti", -1,0,-1,1,-1 );
00177 
00178       guiPrevButton = CreateIconAndTextButton( guiButtonImage, MercInfo[MERC_FILES_PREVIOUS],
00179                                                                                FONT12ARIAL, 
00180                                                                                MERC_BUTTON_UP_COLOR, DEFAULT_SHADOW, 
00181                                                                                MERC_BUTTON_DOWN_COLOR, DEFAULT_SHADOW, 
00182                                                                                TEXT_CJUSTIFIED, 
00183                                                                                MERC_FILES_PREV_BUTTON_X, MERC_FILES_PREV_BUTTON_Y, BUTTON_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH,
00184                                                                                DEFAULT_MOVE_CALLBACK, BtnMercPrevButtonCallback);
00185 
00186       SetButtonCursor(guiPrevButton, CURSOR_LAPTOP_SCREEN);
00187       SpecifyDisabledButtonStyle( guiPrevButton, DISABLED_STYLE_SHADED);
00188 
00189       //Next Button
00190       guiNextButton = CreateIconAndTextButton( guiButtonImage, MercInfo[MERC_FILES_NEXT],
00191                                                                                FONT12ARIAL, 
00192                                                                                MERC_BUTTON_UP_COLOR, DEFAULT_SHADOW, 
00193                                                                                MERC_BUTTON_DOWN_COLOR, DEFAULT_SHADOW, 
00194                                                                                TEXT_CJUSTIFIED, 
00195                                                                                MERC_FILES_NEXT_BUTTON_X, MERC_FILES_NEXT_BUTTON_Y, BUTTON_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH,
00196                                                                                DEFAULT_MOVE_CALLBACK, BtnMercNextButtonCallback);
00197 
00198       SetButtonCursor(guiNextButton, CURSOR_LAPTOP_SCREEN);
00199       SpecifyDisabledButtonStyle( guiNextButton, DISABLED_STYLE_SHADED);
00200 
00201       //Hire button
00202       guiHireButton = CreateIconAndTextButton( guiButtonImage, MercInfo[MERC_FILES_HIRE],
00203                                                                                FONT12ARIAL, 
00204                                                                                MERC_BUTTON_UP_COLOR, DEFAULT_SHADOW, 
00205                                                                                MERC_BUTTON_DOWN_COLOR, DEFAULT_SHADOW, 
00206                                                                                TEXT_CJUSTIFIED, 
00207                                                                                MERC_FILES_HIRE_BUTTON_X, MERC_FILES_HIRE_BUTTON_Y, BUTTON_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH,
00208                                                                                DEFAULT_MOVE_CALLBACK, BtnMercHireButtonCallback);
00209       SetButtonCursor(guiHireButton, CURSOR_LAPTOP_SCREEN);
00210       SpecifyDisabledButtonStyle( guiHireButton, DISABLED_STYLE_SHADED);
00211 
00212       //Back button
00213       guiMercBackButton = CreateIconAndTextButton( guiButtonImage, MercInfo[MERC_FILES_HOME],
00214                                                                                FONT12ARIAL, 
00215                                                                                MERC_BUTTON_UP_COLOR, DEFAULT_SHADOW, 
00216                                                                                MERC_BUTTON_DOWN_COLOR, DEFAULT_SHADOW, 
00217                                                                                TEXT_CJUSTIFIED, 
00218                                                                                MERC_FILES_BACK_BUTTON_X, MERC_FILES_BACK_BUTTON_Y, BUTTON_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH,
00219                                                                                DEFAULT_MOVE_CALLBACK, BtnMercFilesBackButtonCallback);
00220       SetButtonCursor(guiMercBackButton, CURSOR_LAPTOP_SCREEN);
00221       SpecifyDisabledButtonStyle( guiMercBackButton, DISABLED_STYLE_SHADED);
00222 
00223 //    RenderMercsFiles();
00224       return( TRUE );
00225 }

00227 void ExitMercsFiles()
00228 {
00229       DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex(guiPortraitBox);
00230       DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex(guiStatsBox);
00231       DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex(guiBioBox);
00232 
00233       UnloadButtonImage( guiButtonImage );
00234       RemoveButton( guiPrevButton );
00235       RemoveButton( guiNextButton );
00236       RemoveButton( guiHireButton );
00237       RemoveButton( guiMercBackButton );
00238 
00239       RemoveMercBackGround();
00240 }

00247 void RenderMercsFiles()
00248 {
00249   HVOBJECT hPixHandle;
00250 
00251       DrawMecBackGround();
00252 
00253       // Portrait Box
00254       GetVideoObject(&hPixHandle, guiPortraitBox);
00255       BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hPixHandle, 0,MERC_FILES_PORTRAIT_BOX_X, MERC_FILES_PORTRAIT_BOX_Y, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
00256 
00257       // Stats Box
00258       GetVideoObject(&hPixHandle, guiStatsBox);
00259       BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hPixHandle, 0,MERC_FILES_STATS_BOX_X, MERC_FILES_STATS_BOX_Y, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
00260 
00261       // bio box
00262       GetVideoObject(&hPixHandle, guiBioBox);
00263       BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hPixHandle, 0,MERC_FILES_BIO_BOX_X+1, MERC_FILES_BIO_BOX_Y, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
00264 
00265       //Display the mercs face
00266       DisplayMercFace( GetMercIDFromMERCArray( gubCurMercIndex ) );
00267 
00268       //Display Mercs Name
00269       DrawTextToScreen(gMercProfiles[ GetMercIDFromMERCArray( gubCurMercIndex ) ].zName, MERC_NAME_X, MERC_NAME_Y, 0, MERC_NAME_FONT, MERC_NAME_COLOR, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, LEFT_JUSTIFIED);
00270 
00271       //Load and display the mercs bio
00272       UINT8 mercID = GetMercIDFromMERCArray( gubCurMercIndex );
00273       if ( mercID < GASTON )
00274             mercID -= BIFF;
00275       else
00276             mercID -= 154;
00277 
00278       LoadAndDisplayMercBio( mercID );
00279 
00280       //Display the mercs statistic
00281       DisplayMercsStats( GetMercIDFromMERCArray( gubCurMercIndex ) );
00282 
00283       //check to see if the merc is dead if so disable the contact button
00284       if( IsMercDead( GetMercIDFromMERCArray( gubCurMercIndex ) ) )
00285             DisableButton( guiHireButton );
00286       else if( ( LaptopSaveInfo.gubPlayersMercAccountStatus != MERC_ACCOUNT_VALID ) && ( LaptopSaveInfo.gubPlayersMercAccountStatus != MERC_ACCOUNT_SUSPENDED ) && ( LaptopSaveInfo.gubPlayersMercAccountStatus != MERC_ACCOUNT_VALID_FIRST_WARNING ) )
00287       {
00288             //if the players account is suspended, disable the button
00289             DisableButton( guiHireButton );
00290       }
00291       else
00292             EnableButton( guiHireButton );
00293 
00294       //Enable or disable the buttons
00295       EnableDisableMercFilesNextPreviousButton( );
00296 
00297   MarkButtonsDirty( );
00298       RenderWWWProgramTitleBar( );
00299   InvalidateRegion(LAPTOP_SCREEN_UL_X,LAPTOP_SCREEN_WEB_UL_Y,LAPTOP_SCREEN_LR_X,LAPTOP_SCREEN_WEB_LR_Y);
00300 }

00304 
00305 void BtnMercPrevButtonCallback(GUI_BUTTON *btn,INT32 reason)
00306 {
00307       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
00308       {
00309             btn->uiFlags |= BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
00310             InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
00311       }
00312       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
00313       {
00314             if (btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_CLICKED_ON)
00315             {
00316                   btn->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
00317 
00318                   if( gubCurMercIndex > 0 )
00319                         gubCurMercIndex--;
00320 
00321                   //Since there are 2 larry roachburns
00322                   if( gubCurMercIndex == MERC_LARRY_ROACHBURN)
00323                         gubCurMercIndex--;
00324 
00325                   fReDrawScreenFlag = TRUE;
00326 
00327                   //Enable or disable the buttons
00328                   EnableDisableMercFilesNextPreviousButton( );
00329 
00330                   InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
00331             }
00332       }
00333       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LOST_MOUSE)
00334       {
00335             btn->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
00336             InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
00337       }
00338 } 
00339 
00340 
00341 void BtnMercNextButtonCallback(GUI_BUTTON *btn,INT32 reason)
00342 {
00343       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
00344       {
00345             btn->uiFlags |= BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
00346             InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
00347       }
00348       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
00349       {
00350             if (btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_CLICKED_ON)
00351             {
00352                   btn->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
00353 
00354 
00355                   if( gubCurMercIndex <= LaptopSaveInfo.gubLastMercIndex-1 )
00356                         gubCurMercIndex++;
00357 
00358                   //Since there are 2 larry roachburns
00359                   if( gubCurMercIndex == MERC_LARRY_ROACHBURN)
00360                         gubCurMercIndex++;
00361 
00362                   fReDrawScreenFlag = TRUE;
00363 
00364                   //Enable or disable the buttons
00365                   EnableDisableMercFilesNextPreviousButton( );
00366 
00367                   InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
00368             }
00369       }
00370       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LOST_MOUSE)
00371       {
00372             btn->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
00373             InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
00374       }
00375 } 
00376 
00377 
00378 void BtnMercHireButtonCallback(GUI_BUTTON *btn,INT32 reason)
00379 {
00380       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
00381       {
00382             btn->uiFlags |= BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
00383             InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
00384       }
00385       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
00386       {
00387             if (btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_CLICKED_ON)
00388             {
00389                   btn->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
00390 
00391                   //if the players accont is suspended, go back to the main screen and have Speck inform the players
00392                   if( LaptopSaveInfo.gubPlayersMercAccountStatus == MERC_ACCOUNT_SUSPENDED )
00393                   {
00394                         guiCurrentLaptopMode = LAPTOP_MODE_MERC;
00395                         gusMercVideoSpeckSpeech = SPECK_QUOTE_ALTERNATE_OPENING_5_PLAYER_OWES_SPECK_ACCOUNT_SUSPENDED;
00396                         gubArrivedFromMercSubSite = MERC_CAME_FROM_HIRE_PAGE;
00397 
00398                   }
00399 
00400                   //else try to hire the merc
00401                   else if( MercFilesHireMerc( GetMercIDFromMERCArray( gubCurMercIndex ) ) )
00402                   {
00403                         guiCurrentLaptopMode = LAPTOP_MODE_MERC;
00404                         gubArrivedFromMercSubSite = MERC_CAME_FROM_HIRE_PAGE;
00405 
00406                         //start the merc talking
00407 //                      HandlePlayerHiringMerc( GetMercIDFromMERCArray( gubCurMercIndex ) );
00408 
00409                         //We just hired a merc
00410                         gfJustHiredAMercMerc = TRUE;
00411 
00412                         //Display a popup msg box telling the user when and where the merc will arrive
00413                         DisplayPopUpBoxExplainingMercArrivalLocationAndTime( /*GetMercIDFromMERCArray( gubCurMercIndex )*/ ); // doesn't take parameters (jonathanl)
00414                   }
00415 
00416                   InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
00417             }
00418       }
00419       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LOST_MOUSE)
00420       {
00421             btn->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
00422             InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
00423       }
00424 }

00426 
00427 BOOLEAN DisplayMercFace( UINT8 ubMercID)
00428 {
00429   HVOBJECT hFaceHandle;
00430   HVOBJECT hPortraitHandle;
00431       STR                                       sFaceLoc = "FACES\\BIGFACES\\";
00432       char                                sTemp[100];
00433       MERCPROFILESTRUCT *pMerc;
00434   VOBJECT_DESC    VObjectDesc;
00435       SOLDIERTYPE             *pSoldier=NULL;
00436 
00437       // Portrait Frame
00438       GetVideoObject(&hPortraitHandle, guiPortraitBox);
00439   BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hPortraitHandle, 0,MERC_FILES_PORTRAIT_BOX_X, MERC_FILES_PORTRAIT_BOX_Y, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
00440 
00441       pMerc = &gMercProfiles[ ubMercID ];
00442 
00443       //See if the merc is currently hired
00444       pSoldier = FindSoldierByProfileID( ubMercID, TRUE );
00445 
00446       // load the Face graphic and add it
00447   sprintf(sTemp, "%s%02d.sti", sFaceLoc, ubMercID);
00448       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00449       FilenameForBPP(sTemp, VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
00450       CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiMercFace));
00451 
00452       //Blt face to screen 
00453       GetVideoObject(&hFaceHandle, guiMercFace);
00454   BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hFaceHandle, 0,MERC_FACE_X, MERC_FACE_Y, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
00455 
00456       //if the merc is dead, shadow the face red and put text over top saying the merc is dead
00457       if( IsMercDead( ubMercID ) )
00458       {
00459             //shade the face red, (to signif that he is dead)
00460             hFaceHandle->pShades[ 0 ]           = Create16BPPPaletteShaded( hFaceHandle->pPaletteEntry, DEAD_MERC_COLOR_RED, DEAD_MERC_COLOR_GREEN, DEAD_MERC_COLOR_BLUE, TRUE );
00461 
00462             //get the face object
00463             GetVideoObject(&hFaceHandle, guiMercFace);
00464 
00465             //set the red pallete to the face
00466             SetObjectHandleShade( guiMercFace, 0 );
00467 
00468             //Blt face to screen 
00469         BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hFaceHandle, 0,MERC_FACE_X, MERC_FACE_Y, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
00470 
00471             DisplayWrappedString(MERC_FACE_X, MERC_FACE_Y+MERC_PORTRAIT_TEXT_OFFSET_Y, MERC_FACE_WIDTH, 2, FONT14ARIAL, 145, MercInfo[MERC_FILES_MERC_IS_DEAD], FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, CENTER_JUSTIFIED);
00472       }
00473 
00474       else if( ubMercID == FLO && gubFact[ FACT_PC_MARRYING_DARYL_IS_FLO ] )
00475       {
00476             ShadowVideoSurfaceRect( FRAME_BUFFER, MERC_FACE_X, MERC_FACE_Y, MERC_FACE_X + MERC_FACE_WIDTH, MERC_FACE_Y + MERC_FACE_HEIGHT);
00477             DisplayWrappedString( MERC_FACE_X, MERC_FACE_Y+MERC_PORTRAIT_TEXT_OFFSET_Y, MERC_FACE_WIDTH, 2, FONT14ARIAL, 145, pPersonnelDepartedStateStrings[3], FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, CENTER_JUSTIFIED );
00478       }
00479 
00480       //else if the merc is currently a POW or, the merc was fired as a pow
00481       else if( pMerc->bMercStatus == MERC_FIRED_AS_A_POW || ( pSoldier &&  pSoldier->bAssignment == ASSIGNMENT_POW ) )
00482       {
00483             ShadowVideoSurfaceRect( FRAME_BUFFER, MERC_FACE_X, MERC_FACE_Y, MERC_FACE_X + MERC_FACE_WIDTH, MERC_FACE_Y + MERC_FACE_HEIGHT);
00484             DisplayWrappedString(MERC_FACE_X, MERC_FACE_Y+MERC_PORTRAIT_TEXT_OFFSET_Y, MERC_FACE_WIDTH, 2, FONT14ARIAL, 145, pPOWStrings[0], FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, CENTER_JUSTIFIED);
00485       }
00486 
00487       //if the merc is hired already, say it
00488       else if( !IsMercHireable( ubMercID ) && pMerc->bMercStatus == MERC_HIRED_BUT_NOT_ARRIVED_YET || pMerc->bMercStatus > 0 )
00489       {
00490             ShadowVideoSurfaceRect( FRAME_BUFFER, MERC_FACE_X, MERC_FACE_Y, MERC_FACE_X + MERC_FACE_WIDTH, MERC_FACE_Y + MERC_FACE_HEIGHT);
00491             DisplayWrappedString(MERC_FACE_X, MERC_FACE_Y+MERC_PORTRAIT_TEXT_OFFSET_Y, MERC_FACE_WIDTH, 2, FONT14ARIAL, 145, MercInfo[MERC_FILES_ALREADY_HIRED], FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, CENTER_JUSTIFIED);
00492       }
00493 
00494       //if the merc is away on another assignemnt, say the merc is unavailable
00495       else if( !IsMercHireable( ubMercID ) )
00496       {
00497             ShadowVideoSurfaceRect( FRAME_BUFFER, MERC_FACE_X, MERC_FACE_Y, MERC_FACE_X + MERC_FACE_WIDTH, MERC_FACE_Y + MERC_FACE_HEIGHT);
00498             DisplayWrappedString(MERC_FACE_X, MERC_FACE_Y+MERC_PORTRAIT_TEXT_OFFSET_Y, MERC_FACE_WIDTH, 2, FONT14ARIAL, 145, MercInfo[MERC_FILES_MERC_UNAVAILABLE], FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, CENTER_JUSTIFIED);
00499       }
00500 
00501       DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex(guiMercFace);
00502 
00503       return( TRUE );
00504 }

00506 
00507 void LoadAndDisplayMercBio( UINT8 ubMercID )
00508 {
00509       wchar_t     sText[400];
00510       UINT32      uiStartLoc = 0;
00511 
00512       //load and display the merc bio
00513       uiStartLoc = MERC_BIO_SIZE * ubMercID;
00514       LoadEncryptedDataFromFile(MERCBIOFILE, sText, uiStartLoc, MERC_BIO_INFO_TEXT_SIZE);
00515       DisplayWrappedString(MERC_BIO_TEXT_X, MERC_BIO_TEXT_Y, MERC_BIO_WIDTH, 2, MERC_BIO_FONT, MERC_BIO_COLOR, sText, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, LEFT_JUSTIFIED);
00516       
00517       //load and display the merc's additioanl info (if any)
00518       uiStartLoc = MERC_BIO_SIZE * ubMercID + MERC_BIO_INFO_TEXT_SIZE;
00519       LoadEncryptedDataFromFile(MERCBIOFILE, sText, uiStartLoc, MERC_BIO_ADD_INFO_TEXT_SIZE);
00520       if( sText[0] != 0 )
00521       {
00522             DrawTextToScreen( MercInfo[ MERC_FILES_ADDITIONAL_INFO ], MERC_ADD_BIO_TITLE_X, MERC_ADD_BIO_TITLE_Y, 0, MERC_TITLE_FONT, MERC_TITLE_COLOR, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, LEFT_JUSTIFIED );
00523             DisplayWrappedString( MERC_ADD_BIO_TEXT_X, MERC_ADD_BIO_TEXT_Y, MERC_BIO_WIDTH, 2, MERC_BIO_FONT, MERC_BIO_COLOR, sText, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, LEFT_JUSTIFIED );
00524       }     
00525 }

00598 
00599 
00600 
00601 BOOLEAN MercFilesHireMerc(UINT8 ubMercID)
00602 {
00603       MERC_HIRE_STRUCT HireMercStruct;
00604       INT8  bReturnCode;
00605 
00606       memset(&HireMercStruct, 0, sizeof(MERC_HIRE_STRUCT));
00607 
00608       //if the ALT key is down
00609       if( gfKeyState[ ALT ] && CHEATER_CHEAT_LEVEL( ) )
00610       {
00611             //set the merc to be hireable
00612             gMercProfiles[ ubMercID ].bMercStatus = MERC_OK;
00613             gMercProfiles[ ubMercID ].uiDayBecomesAvailable = 0;
00614       }
00615 
00616       //if the merc is away, dont hire
00617       if( !IsMercHireable( ubMercID ) )
00618       {
00619             if( gMercProfiles[ ubMercID ].bMercStatus != MERC_IS_DEAD )
00620             {
00621                   guiCurrentLaptopMode = LAPTOP_MODE_MERC;
00622                   gusMercVideoSpeckSpeech = SPECK_QUOTE_PLAYER_TRIES_TO_HIRE_ALREADY_HIRED_MERC;
00623                   gubArrivedFromMercSubSite = MERC_CAME_FROM_HIRE_PAGE;
00624             }
00625             
00626             return(FALSE);
00627       }
00628 
00629       HireMercStruct.ubProfileID = ubMercID;
00630 
00631 //
00632 //    HireMercStruct.fCopyProfileItemsOver = gfBuyEquipment;
00633 //
00634       HireMercStruct.fCopyProfileItemsOver = TRUE;
00635 
00636       HireMercStruct.iTotalContractLength = 1;
00637 
00638       //Specify where the merc is to appear
00639       HireMercStruct.sSectorX = gsMercArriveSectorX;//13;
00640       HireMercStruct.sSectorY = gsMercArriveSectorY;
00641       HireMercStruct.fUseLandingZoneForArrival = TRUE;
00642 
00643       HireMercStruct.uiTimeTillMercArrives = GetMercArrivalTimeOfDay( );// + ubMercID
00644 
00645 
00646       //Set the time and ID of the last hired merc will arrive
00647 //    LaptopSaveInfo.sLastHiredMerc.iIdOfMerc = HireMercStruct.ubProfileID;
00648 //    LaptopSaveInfo.sLastHiredMerc.uiArrivalTime = HireMercStruct.uiTimeTillMercArrives;
00649 
00650 
00651       bReturnCode = HireMerc( &HireMercStruct );
00652       //already have 20 mercs on the team
00653       if( bReturnCode == MERC_HIRE_OVER_20_MERCS_HIRED )
00654       {
00655             DoLapTopMessageBox( MSG_BOX_LAPTOP_DEFAULT, MercInfo[ MERC_FILES_HIRE_TO_MANY_PEOPLE_WARNING ], LAPTOP_SCREEN, MSG_BOX_FLAG_OK, NULL);
00656             return(FALSE);
00657       }
00658       else if( bReturnCode == MERC_HIRE_FAILED )
00659       {
00660             //function failed
00661             return(FALSE);
00662       }
00663       else
00664       {
00665             //if we succesfully hired the merc
00666             return(TRUE);
00667       }
00668 }

00670 
00671 
00672 void BtnMercFilesBackButtonCallback(GUI_BUTTON *btn,INT32 reason)
00673 {
00674       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
00675       {
00676             btn->uiFlags |= BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
00677             InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
00678       }
00679       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
00680       {
00681             if (btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_CLICKED_ON)
00682             {
00683                   btn->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
00684 
00685                   guiCurrentLaptopMode = LAPTOP_MODE_MERC;
00686                   gubArrivedFromMercSubSite = MERC_CAME_FROM_HIRE_PAGE;
00687 
00688                   InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
00689             }
00690       }
00691       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LOST_MOUSE)
00692       {
00693             btn->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
00694             InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
00695       }
00696 } 
00697 
00698 void EnableDisableMercFilesNextPreviousButton( )
00699 {
00700       if( gubCurMercIndex <= LaptopSaveInfo.gubLastMercIndex-1 )
00701             EnableButton( guiNextButton );            
00702       else
00703             DisableButton( guiNextButton );           
00704 
00705       if( gubCurMercIndex > 0 )
00706             EnableButton( guiPrevButton );
00707       else
00708             DisableButton( guiPrevButton );
00709 }
